content: EmoneyMaxThe best Crypto Marketing ServicesAchieve remarkable results while we take care of your project strategically.All in one: Advertising, Moderation, Designs, Publications, Translations and even more!We have a lot of experience in advertising and needed know how on Reddit, Twitter, Discord and more.We write 8 to 10 comments per hour only in biggest, most known Telegram discussion groups, with real people, moderators, discussion, true live advertising, no scheduling, no copy pasting - real high quality shilling.Other services offer thousands of comments but all of them are made by bots in free ANN channels, this is low quality advertising but to compete with them we will also spread around 1000 comments on all ANN channels weekly.What is even better our team post those comments manually so there is no problem with removals, moderation or banns.To provide only the highest quality here our requirements when it comes to posting:- no copy pasting,- all comments needs to be original,- no scheduling,- everything needs to be written and reported in real time,- no spam, only HQ comments,- all moderated comments in first 24 hours are reposted again,- we hire Quality Managers that are working 24/7 and provide full reports 2 times a day,- everything from report like moderated comments, deletions are REPOSTED again,- each shiller use at least 3 accounts on each platform,- only experienced people, that worked for at least few projects already,- many additional small requirements like (links, accounts, content, latest news, anns...),- bonuses and penalties.We have the highest requirements in the industry in all services we provide, professional admins, mods, translators, shill teams, writers, graphics designers, quality managers, community managers, promotions, hype, advertising, shilling, guerilla marketing, white hack marketing, etcContact us via:

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: In short, you provide a high-quality spam service, right?QuoteWhat is even better our team post those comments manually so there is no problem with removals, moderation or banns.If you intend to post in ANN topics in this forum, the service that you provide is prohibited, regardless of the quality of the posts, it is forbidden to make paid comments in ANN, not to mention paid comments that will give a revival to the user that there are actual experiences for users while they are all paid.In general, without proving that there are popular and reliable accounts, filtering the projects that you accept, and for everything to be clear, your service will most likely not differ from the rest of the spam services (perhaps it is only of high quality).

comments.author: SosSpagetti
comments.body: Hello,You must have misunderstood me. We do not intend to post in ANN topics in this forum. My post was made only to inform people about EmoneyMax Crypto Marketing Services. We work on different social media (Twitter,Telegram...).The shilling you are most likely referring to is not a spam service with bots and post quality like "good project" or 'nice whitepaper". They go and talk with people on different social media platforms in a way professional sellers do. they know project, its weak and strong sites and know how to talk with potential investor. Our people are giving reports of our work in real time. We have big know-how and a base of groups where we can talk to people who are looking for new projects.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.created_time: February 04, 2023, 06:59:35 AMLast edit: November 09, 2023, 07:47:40 AM by CCMS
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on February 02, 2023, 08:34:16 PMIn short, you provide a high-quality spam service, right?QuoteWhat is even better our team post those comments manually so there is no problem with removals, moderation or banns.If you intend to post in ANN topics in this forum, the service that you provide is prohibited, regardless of the quality of the posts, it is forbidden to make paid comments in ANN, not to mention paid comments that will give a revival to the user that there are actual experiences for users while they are all paid.In general, without proving that there are popular and reliable accounts, filtering the projects that you accept, and for everything to be clear, your service will most likely not differ from the rest of the spam services (perhaps it is only of high quality).Spam is when you send same post again and again. It is not wrong to communicate with people, knowing about different projects and at the same time explaining about yours . Marketing is never banned. In this way, you will ask roadside boards to be banned or the ads itself in the TV(s) to be banned which doesn't make sense.
